show.subtitle: Specific information about using evidenced based natural health choices, with knowledgeable authors, guests and hosts.
show.title: The Natural Nurse

title: The Natural Nurse
content:
Topic: The Elephant in the Bedroom, that Men do not Talk About Host Ellen Kamhi, PhD , RN, AHG, AHN-BC,… www.naturalnurse.
com, author of The Natural Guide to Great Sex, interviews Samuel H.
Wood, MA, MD, PhD MBA.
  Dr Wood is a board-certified Reproductive Endocrinologist and world-renowned fertility and sexual medicine specialist with more than 20 years of clinical experience.
He is one of the select physicians in the country listed in, “Who’s Who In America,” “Who’s Who in the World,” and “Who’s Who in Science & Technology,” publications.
Dr Wood’s clinical skills have won him many accolades including being named a “Top Doctor” by US News and World Report.
Dr Wood has  been featured on numerous local and national news broadcasts including the “NBC Nightly News,” the “Today” show, ABC’s “World News Tonight,” “Frontline,” on PBS, as well as many network affiliates across the country.
He is the Medical Director of the Reproductive Sciences Center in La Jolla (www.fertile.com) and the Scientific Director of the La Jolla Centre for Sexual Health Contact:  www.lajollasexualhealth.com
